bug.author: palle-k
bug.summary: Tedlium 2: Pretrained transformer model not available
bug.description: The pretrained Transformer (large model + specaug + large LM) model files for Tedlium 2 are unavailable at the link in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/espnet/espnet/blob/master/egs/tedlium2/asr1/RESULTS.md>RESULTS.md</denchmark-link> file for Tedlium 2, as well as in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/espnet/espnet#results-and-demo>Results and Demo section of the README of this project</denchmark-link> (tedlium2.transformer.v1). In both cases, the link is <denchmark-link:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1mgbiWabOSkh_oHJIDA-h7hekQ3W95Z_U>https://drive.google.com/open?id=1mgbiWabOSkh_oHJIDA-h7hekQ3W95Z_U</denchmark-link> and it leads to the 404 page of Google Drive.

comments.comment: I think you are using recog_wav.sh file, you can replace it with your model if you have one.
My issue is that I cannot access the pre-trained model and that this repository links to files that do not exist. I know how to train my own model.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ShigekiKarita>@ShigekiKarita</denchmark-link> , can you fix the link? I also confirmed that the link is broken. Also, it would be better to put it to my google drive so that I could manage to fix it by myself.

sorry I do not have access to that model file and GPU servers anymore. I wish someone can rerun this exp and upload it...

@ShigekiKarita <https://github.com/ShigekiKarita>, can you fix the link? I also confirmed that the link is broken. Also, it would be better to put it to my google drive so that I could manage to fix it by myself.
